overview: A documentary form by a brazilian magazine called Capricho, shows everyone the human side of Avril Lavigne by meeting with close friends and relatives. Come aboard to the world of Napanee teenager who exploded into the music world in 2002. Tour through her hometown, her favorite places, school and more. Find out what's from behind the scenes in the studio until the release of her second album, 'Under My Skin . Although it doesn't contain any songs or videos by the Canadian (as it's an unauthorized publication), you can feel the whole atmosphere of where Lavigne grew up and how she's became everything she is today.
title: Uma Garota Chamada Avril (Biografia não-autorizada)
